welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nakaechi, the charming city known for its rich culture, delicious cuisine, and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that this wonderful city has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Yokota AFB Airport, primarily used for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Haneda Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Haneda Airport, mainly serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may require re-connection every 3 hours.
